fields.name: terminationTimingInstructions
fields.fieldText: Selecting 'Terminate Household Now' will create the Termination BP record. Selecting 'Terminate Household Later' will create a Task to terminate the Household, due on the date you select.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Terminate Household Now","value":"Terminate Household Now","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","index":0},{"label":"Terminate Household Later","value":"Terminate Household Later","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","index":1}]

fields.name: currentAdvisorTeam

fields.name: newAdvisorTeam
fields.fieldText: Populate those known on the new Advisor Team. This will be the team assigned to the spouse not selected in the table above.
